an8.47:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
an8.47:1.3: ekamantam nisinnam kho visakham migaramataram bhagava etadavoca:
an8.47:2.1: “Atthahi kho, visakhe, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana manapakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an8.47:2.3: Idha, visakhe, matugamo yassa matapitaro bhattuno denti atthakama hitesino anukampaka anukampam upadaya tassa hoti pubbutthayini pacchanipatini kinkarapatissavini manapacarini piyavadini …pe….
an8.47:3.2: Vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacaga payatapanini vossaggarata yacayoga danasamvibhagarata.
an8.47:3.3: Imehi kho, visakhe, atthahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana manapakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjatiti.
